text: Ko Kanko tagi kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin nder balɗe jeegoo, hari arsi Makko kin no ka hoore ndiyam, fii yo O ndaarndo on ko hommbo e mo'on ɓurata moƴƴinnde gollal. Pellet si a wi'i: "Onon ko on ummintinteeɓe ɓaawo maayde", maa heeferɓe ɓen wi'u: "Ɗum wonaali si wanaa mbilewu feeñungu". @Corrected
